name: Daylight's End VR Edition
detailed_description:
New Zombies!

We just uploaded a new version that now includes zombies in and around the lair. More to come. Thanks for your feed back.


About the Software

** UPDATE** Now includes zombies in the lair per your requests. Thanks for your support! DAYLIGHT'S END THE VR EDITION is the first movie to be released in theaters and in VR on the same day. In the experience you are inside the "infected" lair with a giant screen to view the movie. You can unlock weapons by purchasing the chapters of the movie. Just for watching the trailer, you get a free pistol. Movie Synopsis - Years after a mysterious plague has devastated the planet and turned most of humanity into blood-hungry creatures, a rogue drifter on a vengeful hunt stumbles across a band of survivors in an abandoned police station and reluctantly agrees to try to help them defend themselves and escape to the sanctuary they so desperately need. In the experience you are inside the "infected" lair. As you unlock chapters, you will receive weapons used in the movie. Weapons used by Thomas Rourke (Johnny Strong) includes a Colt M1911A1, Double Barreled Shotgun with Exposed Hammers and a M14 - SOCOM 16. Frank Hill (Lance Henriksen) uses a custom engraved nickel plated Colt MKIV Series 80 with pearl grips and a Savage/Stevens 311A Sawed Off Shotgun M4A1 used by Ethan Hill (Louis Mandylor) Glock 17 used by Bishop (Ed Spila) AK-104 used by Vlad Romanov (Sonny Puzikas) MPi-KM-72 used by Ernesta (Heather Kafka) M-16 used by Harker (Matt Beckham) DAYLIGHT’S END was shot in Dallas and points ranging from East Texas to the west Texas town of Rio (pop. 3) along the famed Route 66, the film is a hard driving action-horror-thriller starring Johnny Strong (THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS, BLACK HAWK DOWN), Lance Henriksen (ALIEN, TERMINATOR) and Louis Mandaylor (MY BIG FAT GREEK WEDDING, SINNERS AND SAINTS). The movie focuses on a rogue drifter who’s on a vengeful hunt, years after a mysterious plague has devastated the planet and turned most of humanity into blood-hungry creatures. Chad Law wrote the story for the VR prequel, which movie fans will be able to recognize some friendly and unfriendly faces. The VR chapter is a prequel storyline that stars Johnny Strong, returning as “Thomas Rourke”, the dark and dangerous anti-hero in the feature film. Strong has appeared in BLACK HAWK DOWN, THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS, and GET CARTER. Strong was named “2012’s Breakout Action Star” of the year in William Kaufman’s “SINNERS AND SAINTS.” Running time: 105 minutes The sounds in the VR Experience were custom created by Sound Designer Johnny Marshall utilizing samples from the BOOM Cinematic Guns SFX Libraries.

You can unlock weapons by purchasing the chapters of the movie. Just for watching the trailer, you get a free pistol.

Movie Synopsis - Years after a mysterious plague has devastated the planet and turned most of humanity into blood-hungry creatures, a rogue drifter on a vengeful hunt stumbles across a band of survivors in an abandoned police station and reluctantly agrees to try to help them defend themselves and escape to the sanctuary they so desperately need.

In the experience you are inside the "infected" lair. As you unlock chapters, you will receive weapons used in the movie.
Weapons used by Thomas Rourke (Johnny Strong) includes a Colt M1911A1, Double Barreled Shotgun with Exposed Hammers and a M14 - SOCOM 16.
Frank Hill (Lance Henriksen) uses a custom engraved nickel plated Colt MKIV Series 80 with pearl grips and a Savage/Stevens 311A Sawed Off Shotgun
M4A1 used by Ethan Hill (Louis Mandylor)
Glock 17 used by Bishop (Ed Spila)
AK-104 used by Vlad Romanov (Sonny Puzikas)
MPi-KM-72 used by Ernesta (Heather Kafka)
M-16 used by Harker (Matt Beckham)

DAYLIGHT’S END was shot in Dallas and points ranging from East Texas to the west Texas town of Rio (pop. 3) along the famed Route 66, the film is a hard driving action-horror-thriller starring Johnny Strong (THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS, BLACK HAWK DOWN), Lance Henriksen (ALIEN, TERMINATOR) and Louis Mandaylor (MY BIG FAT GREEK WEDDING, SINNERS AND SAINTS). The movie focuses on a rogue drifter who’s on a vengeful hunt, years after a mysterious plague has devastated the planet and turned most of humanity into blood-hungry creatures.

Chad Law wrote the story for the VR prequel, which movie fans will be able to recognize some friendly and unfriendly faces. The VR chapter is a prequel storyline that stars Johnny Strong, returning as “Thomas Rourke”, the dark and dangerous anti-hero in the feature film. Strong has appeared in BLACK HAWK DOWN, THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS, and GET CARTER. Strong was named “2012’s Breakout Action Star” of the year in William Kaufman’s “SINNERS AND SAINTS.”

Running time: 105 minutes

The sounds in the VR Experience were custom created by Sound Designer Johnny Marshall utilizing samples from the BOOM Cinematic Guns SFX Libraries.

reviews:
“I’ve been looking forward to this movie for literally years so I was excited to finally sit down and watch it. I’m happy to say Daylight’s End surpassed my expectations and is a thrilling and atmospheric post-apocalyptic adventure.”
4/5 Stars - Explosive – The Action Elite

“‘Daylight’s End’ Is Pure Adrenaline and Carnage”
Wow! – Truth on Cinema

“Writer Chad Law's background is heavily steeped in the action genre. Law knows how to create intense, bullet flying scenes. The quick action focused pacing keeps the film's energy in an up tempo state. The blend of genres will draw a wide gamut of viewers to the film.”
7.5/10 – 28DLA
